verbs.description: [ARG0: Last year 's disclosure] [V: revealed] [ARG1: that Trump 's total income from January 2016 through January 2017 was somewhere between $ 600 million and $ 650 million] .
Last year 's disclosure revealed that [ARG1: Trump 's total income from January 2016 through January 2017] [V: was] [ARG2: somewhere between $ 600 million and $ 650 million] .
